plot: A documentary on my late grandmother Nina. A trip to New Delhi, after a seven year absence, leads to the unexpected storytelling of so many years gone by.
title: North Indian Winter
plot_es: A documentary on my late grandmother Nina. A trip to New Delhi, after a seven year absence, leads to the unexpected storytelling of so many years gone by.
